statements: UPDATE MentorshipProgram SET mentor_interests='Tech, Leadership' WHERE mentor_id=1;
UPDATE MentorshipProgram SET mentor_skills='Python, SQL' WHERE mentor_id=2;
UPDATE MentorshipProgram SET mentor_name = 'John Doe', mentor_email = 'john.doe@example.com', mentor_interests = 'Data Science, Machine Learning' WHERE mentor_id = 1;
UPDATE MentorshipProgram SET mentor_skills = 'Python, SQL, Java', mentor_interests = 'Web Development, Cloud Computing' WHERE mentor_id = 2;
UPDATE mentors SET interests='Machine Learning' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE mentees SET email='john.doe@example.com', name='John Doe' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE mentors SET interests = 'Machine Learning, Data Science' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE mentees SET name = 'Alice', interests = 'Web Development' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Mentors SET mentor_experience_years = 5 WHERE mentor_id = 1;
UPDATE MentorshipMatches SET match_score = 8.5, match_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE match_id = 3;
UPDATE Mentors SET mentor_name = 'John Doe', mentor_interests = 'Programming, Design', mentor_experience_years = 5 WHERE mentor_id = 101;
UPDATE MentorshipMatches SET match_score = 9.5, match_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE mentor_id = 101 AND mentee_id = 201;
UPDATE Mentors SET availability = '2023-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE mentor_id = 101
UPDATE MentorshipMatches SET match_date = '2022-12-15' WHERE match_id = 201
UPDATE Mentors SET expertise_area='Machine Learning' WHERE mentor_id=1;
UPDATE MentorshipMatches SET match_date='2022-10-15' WHERE match_id=3;
UPDATE mentors SET mentor_exp = 5 WHERE mentor_id = 1;
UPDATE mentees SET mentee_name = 'Alice', mentee_exp = 3 WHERE mentee_id = 2;
UPDATE mentors SET mentor_exp = mentor_exp + 1 WHERE mentor_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE mentees SET mentee_exp = 5, mentee_name = 'Alice' WHERE mentee_id = 2;
